#summary instructions for setting SDRTrunk to work on Linux

1. Install Java version 7 or newer from [http://oracle.com/java here].

2. Verify java installation in terminal:
'type: java -version'

'java version "1.7.0_55"'
'Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.7.0_55)'
'Java HotSpot (TM) 64-bit Server VM'
  
3. Install udev rules file for any tuners you'll be using

4. Run the SDRTrunk start script:
'./run_SDRTrunk'
